eventDecorators.name: AuctionBid
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionCreated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionExtended
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionMinBidIncrementPercentageUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionReservePriceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionSettled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: AuctionTimeBufferUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a user withdraws their original funds + rewards from the rewards manager.

functionDecorators.name: createBid
functionDecorators.description: Create a bid for a NFT, with a given amount. This contract only accepts payment in ETH.

functionDecorators.name: onERC721Received
functionDecorators.description: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: settleAuction
functionDecorators.description: Settle the current auction with given auctionId.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
